channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Greenshift
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Greenshift

item.title: CVE-2023-0378|2023-02-21T08:50:43.727Z -- unknown -- greenshift
item.description: The Greenshift WordPress plugin before 5.0 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
